Skip to Main Content
###### Terms & Conditions
By rendering West Hills Wine Tours services with a deposit, you agree to the following terms and conditions. #### Disclaimer
A $100 deposit is taken at the time of booking with a credit card that will be held on file. The deposit will be credited to your balance at the end of your tour. #### Deposits
Upon completion of your tour, the final balance will be charged to the card on file.
